title: Introducing: Emily Jones
body:
Featuring production from current Hype Machine favourite Henry Green, alongside one of the most pure vocals this year, **Emily Jones’** debut EP, **_Translate_**, is an intoxicating listen.

Smooth electronica infused ballads, these are expertly crafted love songs, showcasing a colossal amount of potential, part Lapsley, part Shura – it’s undeniably cool. Check out all three tracks below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
